item.title: 二分
item.description: P1024 一元三次方程求解【浮点数二分模版】 AC代码 #include <bits/stdc++.h>using namespace std; double A, B, C, D; double check(double x) { return A * pow(x, 3) + B * pow(x, 2) + C * x + D; } void bs() { double l, r, mid; int cnt = 0; for (double i = -100.0; i <= 100.0; i++) { l = i, r = i + 1; double chl = check(l); double chr = check(r); if (chl == 0) { printf("%.
